thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Europacorp Announces Discussions With Financial And/Or Business Partners To Reinforce Financial Capacities

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Europacorp Announces Discussions With Financial And/Or Business Partners To Reinforce Financial Capacities
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Europacorp Sa:
* CONFIRMS HAS STARTED DISCUSSIONS WITH VARIOUS FINANCIAL AND/OR BUSINESS PARTNERS IN ORDER TO REINFORCE FINANCIAL CAPACITIES‍​
* DISCUSSIONS ARE IN PROGRESS AND WILL LAST AS LONG AS NEEDED
* THE STRUCTURE OF A POTENTIAL DEAL IS NOT DECIDED AND NONE OF THE POTENTIAL PARTNERS HAVE EXCLUSIVITY YET
* CO DENIES THE EXISTENCE OF COUNTERFEITING CONCERNING "ARTHUR" TIRLOGY Source text: bit.ly/2Bp5ISS Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
